name: ABC
text: NEW: Former Vice Pres. Joe Biden retains his Secret Service code name of "Celtic" and his running mate Sen. Kamala Harris assumes the code name "Pioneer," source confirms to @ABC News. https://t.co/V0yStlxtpJ https://t.co/JvRcs3LsM9

name: ABC
text: 68% of Americans say the economy is in not-so-good or poor shape, the most in @ABC News/WaPo polls since October 2014. https://t.co/zoqjUTPKPP https://t.co/7uKjFRPVqT

name: ABC
text: EXCLUSIVE: @DavidMuir to conduct the first joint sit-down with Joe Biden and Kamala Harris and @RobinRoberts to interview Biden and Harris on their history-making ticket. The one-hour primetime special next Sunday 8 p.m. on @ABC. https://t.co/2NbmDTDqOO https://t.co/ua4mFCG7i1

name: ABC
text:
The Democratic National Convention will kick off with a focus on the three major crises gripping the nation: the coronavirus pandemic, the economic downturn and the national reckoning over racial injustice.

@ABC News has complete coverage https://t.co/1RaGw5up50 #DemConvention https://t.co/oG8jjqmVUw

name: ABC
text: BREAKING: The Democratic National Convention officially gets underway with the theme of unity and featuring speakers who represent the party's progressive and traditional platforms. WATCH LIVE: https://t.co/yx5RMYCxBm

name: ABC
text:
